metadata.dc:title: UnEmployed & MoviesRate
metadata.dc:creator: Moumen ALisawe (https://orcid.org/0000-0002-7551-0916)
metadata.dc:subject: Correlation of Movies Score and UnEmployed Rate in USA
metadata.dc:description: Automated tool that computes the correlation between the average Movies Score per year and the amount of UnEmployed person Rate per year in the United States of America since 1988.
